reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: During the years 2004-2007 FSPM has arranged capacity building leadership courses for the personnel in the partner organizations in Africa. The need for leadership training is continual and FSPM's curriculum is nowadays the foundation for the Leadership Ca pacity Building courses (LCB). Since there is no similar leadership training locally, the cooperation partners in Benin, Burundi, Philippines, India, Laos and Tanzania have expressed the need for continual leadership training and based on that request FSPM is now sending a Finnish consultant to Africa and Asia to give LCB courses. LCB is about implementing a fundamental understanding for the principles of leadership and about teaching how to effectively develop personnel and organizations. Modules 1 and 2 w ill continue during the project period and further training will be offered for those who have attained the first two modules, this with the purpose to obtain leaders for national level. In cooperation with the local actors, course material will be produce d.
